requiredEquipmentExplanation: The video title explicitly mentions "NO REPEAT CALISTHENICS WORKOUT" and "Beginner Friendly," indicating that it is likely a bodyweight workout. The tags also emphasize "no equipment" multiple times: "no equipment calisthenics," "at home," "strength training at home," and "home calisthenics." The description further confirms this by stating, "this 15 minute no repeat Calisthenics workout you can do at home with no equipment." Additionally, one of the top comments praises the video's effectiveness for those seeking high-quality, no-equipment workouts. This strong and consistent emphasis across metadata suggests that no equipment is needed for this workout, thus indicating that the workout is intended to be performed using bodyweight exercises only.
